content: hey folks, i'm slowly finalizing a round of financing for my ml startup and i will start hiring people shortly. category theory is very much one of the fields we employ, so i think that people here might be interested. here's a job posting http://traceoid.ai. if you can read and kind of understand this paper https://arxiv.org/abs/2008.02292 (not all of it, more like the rough context), consider contacting me.
